profile.name: Vodafone
profile.description: Vodafone group Plc is one of the world's leading telecommunications groups, with a significant presence in Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Asia Pacific
profile.quote: I am thrilled to have partnered with FooBar on this exciting journey. Not only do they have a compelling vision for digital transformation, their tram understood our business challanges and earned my trust very quickly.

challengeSheet: Given competitive pressure, Vodafone was looking to reduce service cost and improve NPS. To achieve these economic goals, they wanted to re-imagine their customer self-service process and address high call volumes, a key pain point. 40% of Vodafone's inbound calls were status inquires and ripe for automation.
solutionSheet: Vodafone decided to roll out 5000 seats of Service Cloud and 1,000,000 login of Customer Communities. Accenture was the lead implementation partner.
impactSheet: The solution will help improve 2 key metrices once fully rolled out. Improve Agent Productivity by 20% and reduce call wait times by 30%.
whyUsSheet:
Key differentiators that led to Vodafone's decision include:
  • Time to Market: The plot took just 3 months to implement
  • Omnichannel support: Customer can check status across online, mobile app, text and facebook messanger.
  • Open APIs: Pre-built integrations to call management and back office systems
  • Partner Ecosystem: Robust network of SI and ISV partners.
